== Installation ==




== System Requirements ==

Operating System: Windows, Linux

Software dependency:

 * Adobe AIR Runtime
 * Java runtime, minimum version 1.6
 * Flex SDK minimum version 3.0, *Recommended version: 3.4*. With Flex SDK version 4, the projects of type Server and AVM will not compile correctly.
 * On Linux you will need Nautilus in order to be able to use "Open native file browser" command.

On Linux, you will need root (or sudo) access.
